casebody.data:
Susan Capuano TORDA, Mother of Joseph Michael Torda, petitioner,
v.
FAIRFAX COUNTY SCHOOL BOARD. No. 13-6908. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 13, 2014.

Former decision, 134 S.Ct. 722.

Motion of petitioner for reconsideration of order denying leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied.
